fn.p: Qi Gao, Studying for doctorate, Team of Spine and Spinal Cord, Department of Orthopedics, China-Japan Friendship Hospital, Jilin University, Changchun 130033, Jilin Province, China
Qi Gao and Yonghui Liang contributed equally to this paper.

Author contributions: Qi Gao and Yonghui Liang were responsible for data collection and analysis. Xiaoyu Yang and Guifeng Liu were in charge of study concept/design and guidance. Benqing Zhu authorized the manuscript. Jian Liu and Maoguang Yang participated in statistical analysis and wrote the manuscript. Weiwei Xia, Jian Dong, Jianhang Jiao and Xiaoxue Li provided technical and data support.
